Module it.polimi.ingsw.am16
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am16.common.model.players

Class PlayArea

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am16.common.model.players.PlayArea
All Implemented Interfaces:
PlayAreaModel, Serializable
public class PlayArea extends Object implements PlayAreaModel, Serializable
Class representing the player's play area. Contains info about card placement and resource/object counts.
See Also:

    checkLegalMove(PlayableCard playedCard, SideType side, Position playedCardPosition)
    Checks whether a move is legal or not by following these three steps:
    checks if the position is already occupied; checks if the playedCard has been placed isolated from the rest of the field; checks if the playedCard has been placed over a blocked corner; checks if the playedCard cost is satisfied.

    private void
    updateBounds(Position playedCardPosition)
    Updates the bounds of the play area.
    private void
    updateCounts(BoardCard playedCard, Position playedCardPosition)
    Updates the amounts of resources and objects by following these three steps:
    - increases the resources and objects that are in the corners of the new card;
    - increases the resources that are permanent in the new card;
    - decrements the resources and objects that have been hidden by the new card.
    private void
    updateField(BoardCard playedCard, SideType side, Position playedCardPosition)
    Increases the card count, adds the new position to the placement order list, maps the played card to the position and the visible side to the card.

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayArea

      public PlayArea()
      Creates a play area, initializing its player, its other attributes are set to standard values.

    • PlayArea

      private PlayArea(int cardCount, Map<Cornerable,Integer> resourceAndObjectCounts, List<Position> cardPlacementOrder, Map<Position,BoardCard> field, Map<BoardCard,SideType> activeSideTypes, int minX, int maxX, int minY, int maxY, Set<Position> legalPositions, Set<Position> illegalPositions)
      Constructs a new PlayArea object, setting all the attributes to the ones given as parameters. This constructor is private because it should only be used by PlayArea.Deserializer.
      Parameters:
      cardCount - The PlayArea's card count.
      resourceAndObjectCounts - The Map containing all the resources and objects currently visible on the player's field.
      cardPlacementOrder - The List containing the Positions in of the placed cards, in the order they were placed in.
      field - The player's play field.
      activeSideTypes - The Map containing which side every card was played on.
      minX - The minimum x-coordinate of a card in the player's play field.
      maxX - The maximum x-coordinate of a card in the player's play field.
      minY - The minimum y-coordinate of a card in the player's play field.
      maxY - The maximum y-coordinate of a card in the player's play field.
      legalPositions - The set of positions in which a card can be placed.
      illegalPositions - The set of positions in which a card cannot be placed.

  • Method Details

      public int getCardCount()
      Returns:
      How many cards have already been played.

      public Set<Position> getRemovedLegalPositions()
      Specified by:
      getRemovedLegalPositions in interface PlayAreaModel

    • isDeadlocked

      public boolean isDeadlocked()
      Specified by:
      isDeadlocked in interface PlayAreaModel
      Returns:
      Whether the player has no valid moves to make.

    • setStarterCard

      public void setStarterCard(StarterCard starterCard, SideType side)
      Places the starter card at the origin (0, 0) of the play area and updates the amounts of resources. If the starter card was already placed, this method does nothing.
      Parameters:
      starterCard - The starter card chosen by the player.
      side - The visible side of the starter card.

    • playCard

      public void playCard(PlayableCard playedCard, SideType side, Position playedCardPosition) throws IllegalMoveException
      Places the played card at the given position of the play area, updates the amounts of resources and objects, updates the bounds and awards points to the player.
      Parameters:
      playedCard - The card chosen by the player.
      side - The visible side of the card.
      playedCardPosition - The position chosen by the player to place the card.
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - Thrown if the move is not permitted. The check is done using checkLegalMove(...).

    • awardGamePoints

      public int awardGamePoints(PlayableCard playedCard)
      Parameters:
      playedCard - The placed card.
      Returns:
      The number of game points awarded by the given card.

    • updateField

      private void updateField(BoardCard playedCard, SideType side, Position playedCardPosition)
      Increases the card count, adds the new position to the placement order list, maps the played card to the position and the visible side to the card. Updates the placeablePositions set.
      Parameters:
      playedCard - The card chosen by the player.
      side - The visible side of the card.
      playedCardPosition - The position chosen by the player to place the card.

    • updateCounts

      private void updateCounts(BoardCard playedCard, Position playedCardPosition)
      Updates the amounts of resources and objects by following these three steps:
      - increases the resources and objects that are in the corners of the new card;
      - increases the resources that are permanent in the new card;
      - decrements the resources and objects that have been hidden by the new card.
      Parameters:
      playedCard - The card chosen by the player.
      playedCardPosition - The position chosen by the player to place the card.

    • updateBounds

      private void updateBounds(Position playedCardPosition)
      Updates the bounds of the play area.
      Parameters:
      playedCardPosition - The position chosen by the player to place the card.

    • getPlacementOrder

      public List<Position> getPlacementOrder()
      Specified by:
      getPlacementOrder in interface PlayAreaModel
      Returns:
      A List containing the Positions of the cards in the order they were placed in.

    • getField

      public Map<Position,BoardCard> getField()
      Specified by:
      getField in interface PlayAreaModel
      Returns:
      The player's field.

    • getActiveSides

      public Map<BoardCard,SideType> getActiveSides()
      Specified by:
      getActiveSides in interface PlayAreaModel
      Returns:
      The visible side of the cards.

    • checkLegalMove

      public boolean checkLegalMove(PlayableCard playedCard, SideType side, Position playedCardPosition)
      Description copied from interface: PlayAreaModel
      Checks whether a move is legal or not by following these three steps:
      1. checks if the position is already occupied;
      2. checks if the playedCard has been placed isolated from the rest of the field;
      3. checks if the playedCard has been placed over a blocked corner;
      4. checks if the playedCard cost is satisfied.
      Specified by:
      checkLegalMove in interface PlayAreaModel
      Parameters:
      playedCard - The card chosen by the player.
      side - The visible side of the card.
      playedCardPosition - The position chosen by the player to place the card.
      Returns:
      true if the move is legal otherwise returns false.
